title: Benefits Of Getting Vaccinated
content:
If you are
pregnant
Getting a COVID-19 vaccine while you are pregnant helps protect you. It also helps protect your baby from severe health outcomes due to COVID-19 before they become
eligible for COVID-19 vaccination
when they are 6 months old.
11
During October 2022â€“April 2024, 1,470 infants less than 6 months old were hospitalized with COVID-19.
